name: Summer and Winter Weather Simulation
description:
Overview:
A built-out season-changing system with the following features: 

  • The system switches from summer to winter.
    • Summer is characterized by bright green grasses, sunny blue skies, and colorful wildflowers.
    • Winter is characterized by fluffy white snow, snowy days, and cold wind.
  • As you traverse the environment, you'll see an impact - trails in the snow, grass responding to the movement, etc.
  • Each season has a different soundscape.
  • A smooth transition between seasons, as if the season is changing around the player as they explore.

Instructions:
Press the spacebar to see the weather change!

Tech Artists:
Jiaxin Hung - Grass Interactions/Swaying
Jaclyn Ngo - Snow system/Sound
Isabelle Avena - Skybox/Trails

Assets Used: 

  • RPG Poly Pack - Lite asset from Gigel: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/rpg-poly-pack-lite-148410 
  • SkyBox Possibilities:
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-extended-shader-107400
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/customizable-skybox-174576
  • Summer / Winter soundscape - https://freesound.org/
